title: Who are in your opinion the "Funniest champions" in League?
body:
No doubt Riot has made some pretty silly champion concepts with some pretty hilarious VO lines as well. Who is in your opinion, the funniest champion(s) in the game? Heres a few to select from if you are stuck.
{{champion:240}} - The Hillbilly Yordle
{{champion:79}} - The drunken fat man
{{champion:54}} - The retarded rock
{{champion:154}} - The walking piece of puddy
{{champion:427}} - The forest gossiper 
Personally, mine is {{champion:21}}. Her walk cycle and the amount of innuendos in her abilities and voice lines is hilarious. Also her splash art. How does her back even support...you know?

replies.body:
{{champion:131}}  A man, a woman, and a Yordle walk into the sun.
{{champion:131}} They die.
{{champion:131}} ...
{{champion:131}} Because it burns them alive.
When a comment has more upvotes than the post ...
A pretty funny comment m8

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

I don't think I've ever received so many upvotes on a single comment before, and honestly I am a little confused.

Mundo.

> "_Mundo took out his notepad, a tool he often used to mark down observations about his patients, both past and present. The notepad was large, yellow, and imaginary._"

Hahaha oh please, please no, please don't kill me.
{{champion:36}}

> The words of his medical vows – “MUNDO FIX ALL THINGS, MUNDO DO MEDICINE VERY HARD” – ran through his head again and again. 

Mundo's short story is one of the best.
Love how it's large and yellow before it's imaginary xD

Not only that, he'll send his enemies on Corporate retreat.

(Corporate Mundo is my fave skin for him. I'd love to see more silly skins in that vein alongside Gentleman Cho'Gath and any others whose names escape me at this time.)
Obvious Shaco. He is a clown, after all.
Galio!
Galio "Justice" Justice

I'm awfully fond of Braum. He's so charming and earnest, he always makes me smile.
{{champion:201}}  "A shield for my shield? I like it!"


Xayah and Rakan have quickly risen to the top, too. They have one exchange that is literally something that my wife and I might say to one another.
{{champion:497}}  "Be right back."
{{champion:498}}  "Will you?"
{{champion:497}}  "Who can know these things?"
{{champion:498}}  "You! You can know these things!"
How dare no one post the master of puns {{champion:8}}
I'm impressed that the champion designers have made it so that silly things about champs have continued to amuse me and others over time.
i want to die everytime i hear lulu speak

{{champion:98}}  If light travels so fast, how come its never caught a ninja?

{{champion:83}}  Guess I'll have an eternity to think about that one.
I always thought he says ''how come it's never called a ninja'' lol

{{champion:136}} 


he's such a giant ass and its the funniest thing ever even if i forget he is a champion some times

"Just put it on my tab. The names Pantheon."

Classic Sol
Ryze, he's a different joke every season.
This isn't getting the attention it deserves.

{{champion:82}} : we need you!
'random champ: eeeh ,no thanks,
{{champion:82}} : too late

I also enjoy {{champion:30}}  in toplane when i play with friends. They refer to me as  "The eye of Sauron" because I just hold on my position and I watch carefully the other lanes to skillfuly and gracefuly press R.

Simply put, pretty badass.
What a Karthus top

{{champion:45}} if skins count.
https://youtu.be/ZYCiDwhfDqs?t=2m44s
I found the references pretty amusing.
Lmao either {{champion:240}} or {{champion:136}} cause of their lines
BOOP.
BOOOOOP.

Kled. I've been reading all kinds of dumb conspiracy theories the last few days just to entertain myself and Kled simply has that while being a extremely self ironic hillbilly. One of the few champions of which I pay attention to their lines ingame. ^^
"I'M GONNA REACH DOWN YOUR THROAT AND TURN YOUR LUNGS INTO MITTENS!!!"

Can't beat Kled - "Holy ****, where are we?" upon starting a game, when every other champion just thinks nothing of it, breaks the fourth wall in the best way.

Also, blood-curdling screams about brain-weasles while brutally murdering people with an axe.

Galio should be mentioned. "Whoa, I didn't know I had a tail!"
Jinx and Twitch got some pretty funny personalities and voice lines! ;)

> [{quoted}](name=xScarfy,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=MzJBwMLB,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-24T07:53:40.801+0000)
>
> Jinx and Twitch got some pretty funny personalities and voice lines! ;)

**HY**
What does “HY“ stand for?

Mordekiaser.  Nothing is funnier than 1 vs 4ing, having almost no health, sheilding, healing it back, getting a Quadra kill, and spamming /l for the hues.

Also, a Sion who is running away: "NOTHING  CAN STAAAWP MEEEEEE" As he's totally bitching out. LOLOLOLOL

Also, being a fed full lifesteal Olaf, 1 vs 5ing, with your hp bar teetering up and down as you walk away with minimal damage, and go to soli baron... taking no damage
Kled, just Kled
for me it's swain currently. tries to act all tactical when your solution to all problems is just eating them. also that little look around he does before he dances is just so funny.

{{champion:223}} Diss everyone constantly while being a finely cultured catfish demon with an amazing southern accent, a fine coat and vest, and a hilariously small top hat. 

Seriously, the team that worked on Tahm Kench deserves a medal. He is so much fun.

{{champion:268}} The voice actor for Azir clearly enjoyed himself and just hammed it up. I just imagine every one of his lines being in all-caps, and I find him both hilarious and endearing for it.
{{champion:75}} Nasus' existence is what I like to call "The God Ham". His lines are pretty badass, and the VA clearly liked his role, but managed to be both hammy and god-like (i.e.: quieter and a bit philosophical). It's deserving of a golf clap at minimum. While not the funniest, I can appreciate the ham.
{{champion:240}} Any list that doesn't include Kled (and Skarl!) is the wrong list. Kled's existence is to be a goofball hillbilly, and he nailed it with flying colors. And bullets. Mostly bullets.
{{champion:157}} Hilarious moreso on a meta level than anything. It just amuses me how much people hate this guy.
{{champion:9}} Tell me one thing funnier in League than buying Surprise Party Fiddlesticks, hiding in a bush, ulting out of that bush on some unlucky sod, and yelling "HAPPY BIRTHDAY!" as their face melts. You got one second to do so, go. That's right, there isn't anything funnier.
{{champion:498}} & {{champion:497}} This duo is basically an edgy teenager and a self-absorbed suave-as-hell flirt. (in that respective order) The way they banter with each other is entertaining as hell. It almost sounds like an elderly couple arguing at times.
{{champion:115}} Anything obsessed with explosives is probably just destined to get a little (or a lotta) crazy.
{{champion:83}} "THAT'S ONE MORE GRAVE" "THAT'S ONE MORE GRAVE" "THAT'S ONE MORE GRAVE" "THAT'S ONE MORE GRAVE" "THAT'S ONE MORE GRAVE"
{{champion:41}} Gangplank is just--- "BARRELS" As I was--- "ANOTHER" AS I WAS--- "That's a chain!" ..."EVERYONE PAYS" See what I mean. He's a treat to listen to and just dripping with ham. But then he ate some---"BARRELS"
{{champion:33}} OK.

"Are you having fun over there?"
"I can't hear you over all the fun I'm having!" 

Rakan and Xayah are pretty funny, though personally I also find them cute AF.

"I'm so tired... "
"You gotta rest, honey."
"Everyone is depending on me."
"Everyone can wait."
The funniest thing about fiddle is how his idle animation completely stops after like 5 seconds

I like Blitzcrank... Not because of his voice lines, rhose are pretty boring. The things he does though outside of Summoner's Rift are adorable and it makes me giggle. His semi love affair with Orianna. His love of living things and his obsession with grabbing them. His love of pretty and shiny objects. His ignorance of the world and his search for the meaning of life. His dear friends the poros (suck it braum). Idk if he actually is like this, but i imagine him like that.

Also, he's a robot... And who doesn't think robots are hilarious.

*enter bender meme here*
Gentleman {{champion:31}}  because of reasons
{{champion:99}} cuz the laugh
{{champion:17}}

{{champion:266}} 

Doesn't even exist.

>{{champion:266}} 

Who is that? Did they already announce the new champion? :O
